titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Kansas City Chiefs on their victory in Super Bowl LIV and the National Football League on its 100th season.
A resolution congratulating the Kansas City Chiefs on their victory in Super Bowl LIV and the National Football League on its 100th season.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: This resolution congratulates the Kansas City Chiefs and their fans for their victory in Super Bowl LIV and the National Football League on a successful 100th season.
